00170     private void initilizeMap() {
00171         if (googleMap == null) {
00172             googleMap = ((MapFragment) getFragmentManager().findFragmentById(
00173                     R.id.map)).getMap();
00174  
00175             // check if map is created successfully or not
00176             if (googleMap == null) {
00177                 Toast.makeText(getApplicationContext(),
00178                         "Sorry! unable to create maps", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT)
00179                         .show();
00180             }
00181         }
00182         
00183 
00184         
00185         // Getting LocationManager object from System Service LOCATION_SERVICE
00186         LocationManager locationManager = (LocationManager) getSystemService(LOCATION_SERVICE);
00187 
00188         // Creating a criteria object to retrieve provider
00189         Criteria criteria = new Criteria();
00190         
00191         // Getting the name of the best provider
00192         String provider = locationManager.getBestProvider(criteria, true);
00193 
00194         
00195         // Getting Current Location
00196         Location location = locationManager.getLastKnownLocation(provider);
00197         
00198         googleMap.setMyLocationEnabled(true); // false to disable
00199         // Sets the map type to be "hybrid"
00200         googleMap.setMapType(GoogleMap.MAP_TYPE_HYBRID);
00201         
00202         LatLngBounds US = new LatLngBounds(
00203                           new LatLng(-44, 113), new LatLng(-10, 154));
00204         
00205         // Getting latitude of the current location
00206         double latitude = location.getLatitude();
00207 
00208         // Getting longitude of the current location
00209         double longitude = location.getLongitude();
00210         
00211         SecondActivity places = new SecondActivity();

00213         
00214         //latitude = places.placesListItems.get(1)
00215

00217                         
00218

00220         googleMap.addMarker(new MarkerOptions().position(new LatLng(latitude, longitude)).title("You are here."));
00221         googleMap.setMapType(googleMap.MAP_TYPE_HYBRID);
00222         googleMap.setTrafficEnabled(true);
00223         CameraPosition cameraPosition = new CameraPosition.Builder()
00224         .zoom(10)                   // Sets the zoom
00225         .target(new LatLng(latitude, longitude))
00226         .bearing(90)                // Sets the orientation of the camera to east
00227         .tilt(30)                   // Sets the tilt of the camera to 30 degrees
00228         .build();                   // Creates a CameraPosition from the builder
